bibl.title: Telegram from Florence M. Read to Laura Armistead Carter, September 14, 1925

div1.p: Read sends her condolences upon the death of Henry Carter.

div1.head: Telegram from Florence M. Read to Laura Armistead Carter, September 14, 1925
div1.opener:
Form 1701
WESTERN UNION
WESTERN UNION
TELEGRAM
NEWCOMB CARLTON, PRESIDENT
GEORGE W. E. ATKINS, FIRST VICE-PRESIDENT
_____________________________________________
The filing time as shown in the date line on full-rate telegrams and day letters, and the time of receipt at destination as shown on all messages, is STANDARD TIME.
Received at
76W DQ 21
1104 CONN. AVE. MAIN 6480
CO NEW YORK NY 948AM SEPT 14 1925
MISS LAURA A CARTER 70
2122 CALIF ST NW WASHINGTON DC
div1.p:
PRIVILEGE OF KNOWING YOUR FATHER IS ONE OF TREASURIES OF
MY LIFE PLEASE WIRE US CONCERNING FUNERAL ARRANGEMENTS
LOVE TO YOU
